sentence.Network_en: He inherited his father by right of his primogeniture.
sentence.Network_cn: 他凭着长子继承权,继承了他父亲的财产.

PerfectNetExp.abs: primitive farming 原始耕种primogeniture 长子继承权prismatic compass 棱镜罗盘
primogenitor 祖先primogeniture 长子身份primordial 原始的
除了上述领主对土地的封建附属权利以外，封建法律对土地的继承还有诸多限制，例如长子继承制(primogeniture)。在1540年遗嘱法(Statute of Wills)以前，英国封建法律规定，土地不能通过遗嘱继承.
※ 嫡长子继承制（primogeniture） －－－－－－－－－－ ●唐太宗．李世民（Emperor Taizong of Tang） 　（599－626－649） ●唐 …

list.exp: 长嗣继承制和幼嗣继承制

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin primogenitura, from Latin primo 'first' + genitura 'geniture'

means.word_mean: 1. right of inheritance belongs exclusively to the eldest son

auth_sentence.content: Primogeniture...supplanted the...custom of equal partition of lands.
auth_sentence.res_content: Primogeniture...supplanted the...custom of equal partition of lands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Primogeniture...supplanted the...custom of equal partition of lands.

auth_sentence.content: Until now, primogeniture has largely determined which family members will join the business.
auth_sentence.res_content: Until now, primogeniture has largely determined which family members will join the business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Until now, primogeniture has largely determined which family members will join the business.

auth_sentence.content: The Government's plans challenge the ancient right of male primogeniture and so they should.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Government's plans challenge the ancient right of male primogeniture and so they should.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Government's plans challenge the ancient right of male primogeniture and so they should.
